languages.text: {n}Стальной голос Стракса мгновенно отрезает:{/n} "Нет. Я посрамил имя Адептус Арбитес, поддавшись на манипуляции префекта Вультур. Я предал Лекс Империалис, который должен был блюсти. Я виновен. Исполните приговор".

{n}Strachs instantly snaps in a steely voice,{/n} "No. I have shamed the Adeptus Arbites by yielding to Prefect Vultur's manipulation. I have betrayed the Lex Imperialis, the very law I was duty-bound to uphold. I am guilty. I insist that you pass the sentence and carry it out immediately."
languages.original_text: {n}Стальной голос Стракса мгновенно отрезает:{/n} "Нет. Я посрамил имя Адептус Арбитес, поддавшись на манипуляции префекта Вультур. Я предал Лекс Империалис, который должен был блюсти. Я виновен. Исполните приговор".

I have betrayed the Lex Imperialis, the very law I was duty-bound to uphold. I am guilty. I insist that you pass the sentence and carry it out immediately."

{n}Strachs instantly snaps in a steely voice,{/n} "No. I have shamed the Adeptus Arbites by yielding to Prefect Vultur's manipulation. I have betrayed the Lex Imperialis, the very law I was duty-bound to uphold. I am guilty. I insist that you pass the sentence and carry it out immediately."

languages.text: {n}Strachs schlägt sofort einen stählernen Ton an: {/n} "Nein. Ich habe das Adeptus Arbites beschämt, als ich Präfektin Vulturs Manipulation erlag. Ich habe das Lex Imperia verraten, das zu wahren ich geschworen habe. Ich bin schuldig. Ich bestehe darauf, dass Ihr das Urteil verkündet und umgehend vollstreckt."
languages.original_text: {n}Strachs instantly snaps in a steely voice,{/n} "No. I have shamed the Adeptus Arbites by yielding to Prefect Vultur's manipulation. I have betrayed the Lex Imperialis, the very law I was duty-bound to uphold. I am guilty. I insist that you pass the sentence and carry it out immediately."

traits.locale_text: {n}Strachs schlägt sofort einen stählernen Ton an: {/n} "Nein. Ich habe das Adeptus Arbites beschämt, als ich Präfektin Vulturs Manipulation erlag. Ich habe das Lex Imperia verraten, das zu wahren ich geschworen habe. Ich bin schuldig. Ich bestehe darauf, dass Ihr das Urteil verkündet und umgehend vollstreckt."

languages.text: « Non, {n}rétorque immédiatement Strachs d'une voix sèche.{/n} J'ai déshonoré l'Adeptus Arbites en me laissant manipuler par la préfète. J'ai trahi la Lex Imperialis, la loi même que j'avais le devoir de faire respecter. Je suis coupable. J'insiste pour que vous prononciez ma sentence et l'exécutiez immédiatement. »
languages.original_text: {n}Strachs instantly snaps in a steely voice,{/n} "No. I have shamed the Adeptus Arbites by yielding to Prefect Vultur's manipulation. I have betrayed the Lex Imperialis, the very law I was duty-bound to uphold. I am guilty. I insist that you pass the sentence and carry it out immediately."

traits.locale_text: « Non, {n}rétorque immédiatement Strachs d'une voix sèche.{/n} J'ai déshonoré l'Adeptus Arbites en me laissant manipuler par la préfète. J'ai trahi la Lex Imperialis, la loi même que j'avais le devoir de faire respecter. Je suis coupable. J'insiste pour que vous prononciez ma sentence et l'exécutiez immédiatement. »

languages.text: {n}斯塔克斯立刻开了口，声音斩钉截铁。{/n}“不，我听从沃尔图尔行政官的操纵，令法务部蒙辱，背叛了我本该维护的帝国法典。我犯下了罪行，我坚决要求你即刻传达判决，立刻执行。”
languages.original_text: {n}Strachs instantly snaps in a steely voice,{/n} "No. I have shamed the Adeptus Arbites by yielding to Prefect Vultur's manipulation. I have betrayed the Lex Imperialis, the very law I was duty-bound to uphold. I am guilty. I insist that you pass the sentence and carry it out immediately."

traits.locale_text: {n}斯塔克斯立刻开了口，声音斩钉截铁。{/n}“不，我听从沃尔图尔行政官的操纵，令法务部蒙辱，背叛了我本该维护的帝国法典。我犯下了罪行，我坚决要求你即刻传达判决，立刻执行。”

languages.text: {n}Strachs te responde con voz férrea:{/n} «No. Avergoncé al Adeptus Arbites al ceder a las manipulaciones de la Prefecta Vultur. He traicionado la misma Lex Imperialis que mi deber me obliga a defender. Soy culpable. Insisto en que dicte sentencia y la ejecute de inmediato».
languages.original_text: {n}Strachs instantly snaps in a steely voice,{/n} "No. I have shamed the Adeptus Arbites by yielding to Prefect Vultur's manipulation. I have betrayed the Lex Imperialis, the very law I was duty-bound to uphold. I am guilty. I insist that you pass the sentence and carry it out immediately."

traits.locale_text: {n}Strachs te responde con voz férrea:{/n} «No. Avergoncé al Adeptus Arbites al ceder a las manipulaciones de la Prefecta Vultur. He traicionado la misma Lex Imperialis que mi deber me obliga a defender. Soy culpable. Insisto en que dicte sentencia y la ejecute de inmediato».

languages.text: {n}ストラッチスはすぐに頑固そうな声で言い返す。{/n}「いいえ。私はヴァルター総監の策略に屈し、高等裁定局に恥をかかせてしまいました。私は、守らなければならない法であるレックス・インペリアを裏切ったのです。私は有罪です。直ちに判決を下し、執行することを求めます」
languages.original_text: {n}Strachs instantly snaps in a steely voice,{/n} "No. I have shamed the Adeptus Arbites by yielding to Prefect Vultur's manipulation. I have betrayed the Lex Imperialis, the very law I was duty-bound to uphold. I am guilty. I insist that you pass the sentence and carry it out immediately."

traits.locale_text: {n}ストラッチスはすぐに頑固そうな声で言い返す。{/n}「いいえ。私はヴァルター総監の策略に屈し、高等裁定局に恥をかかせてしまいました。私は、守らなければならない法であるレックス・インペリアを裏切ったのです。私は有罪です。直ちに判決を下し、執行することを求めます」

languages.text: {n}Strachs, anında çelik gibi bir sesle karşılık veriyor.{/n} "Hayır. Prefekt Vultur'un manipülasyonuna kanarak Adeptus Arbites'in yüzünü kara çıkardım. Korumakla yükümlü olduğum Lex İmperialis'e, bizzat kanuna ihanet ettim. Suçluyum. Beni derhâl infaz ederek cezalandırmanızı talep ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Strachs instantly snaps in a steely voice,{/n} "No. I have shamed the Adeptus Arbites by yielding to Prefect Vultur's manipulation. I have betrayed the Lex Imperialis, the very law I was duty-bound to uphold. I am guilty. I insist that you pass the sentence and carry it out immediately."

traits.locale_text: {n}Strachs anında çelik gibi bir sesle karşılık veriyor:{/n} "Hayır. Prefekt Vultur'un manipülasyonuna kanarak Adeptus Arbites'in yüzünü kara çıkardım. Korumakla yükümlü olduğum Lex Imperialis'e, bizzat kanuna ihanet ettim. Suçluyum. Beni derhâl infaz ederek cezalandırmanızı talep ediyorum."
